messages.subject: Conference program question
messages.msgSnippet: I cannot make it to this year s conference in SC. I was wondering about the program from last year s conference that lists for $4.00.  It says all speaker s
messages.messageBody:
I cannot make it to this year's conference in SC.

I was wondering about the "program" from last year's conference that lists for $4.00. It says "all speaker's notes"

Is that a word for word transcript of the talks that were given?

Kristen


****************************************************************

Today is even more important than tomorrow because "today" is a gift, and "tomorrow" might never come.

Today is where hope lives because today is when we can make things better than yesterday.

The only thing we can be sure of is today and life isn't worth living if it isn't lived in joy for as many moments of today as we can manage.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
